poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The cause isn't noble, but they are: in-bred
To expect - why not? - a Montgomery martini;
That's 16 to 1, or the whole drawling mute
To one fox that mooched and grendelled
Round their panicking chicken moot.
Come all ye sock-mouthed socialites. Mount up!
Tally ho!
